title: The Red Badge of Courage (Part 10)
description: Henry returns the packet Wilson gave him before the first battle. The regiment takes up a new position and prepares to turn back another Confederate advance.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
reviewWords: Use the Reading strategy of retelling to better understand a text
comprehension: Dialect                : Recognize and understand the use of dialects
